query: select pg_locks.pid, mode, query from pg_locks, pg_stat_activity where granted = false and locktype = 'transactionid'

SELECT date_trunc('seconds', now()), datid, datname, pid, usesysid, usename, application_name, client_addr, client_hostname, client_port, date_trunc('seconds', backend_start) AS backend_start, date_trunc('seconds', xact_start) AS xact_start, date_trunc('seconds', query_start) AS query_start, state_change, waiting, query FROM pg_stat_activity ORDER BY pid
select pg_locks.pid, mode, query from pg_locks, pg_stat_activity where granted = false and locktype = 'transactionid'

SELECT date_trunc('seconds', now()), datid, datname, pid, usesysid, usename, application_name, client_addr, client_hostname, client_port, date_trunc('seconds', backend_start) AS backend_start, date_trunc('seconds', xact_start) AS xact_start, date_trunc('seconds', query_start) AS query_start, state_change, waiting, query FROM pg_stat_activity ORDER BY pid
